Class SavingsAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
      • SavingsAccount

  • public class SavingsAccount
extends BankAccount
    SavingsAccount is a subclass of BankAccount. This class creates a savings account object.
    Author:
    Juan Lopez

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deposit(double amount)
      calls deposit method of super class, sets account to active if balance is equal to or greater than $100

      monthylProcess charges the account for having more than 5 withdraws.
      java.lang.String toString()
      calls toString method of super class
      boolean withdraw(double amount)
      calls withdraw method of super class, sets account to inactive if balance is less than $100

        rt - interest rate

    • Method Detail

      • monthlyProcess

        public void monthlyProcess()
        monthylProcess charges the account for having more than 5 withdraws. Calculates the interest on the account and adds that amount to the balance. Resets the withdraw number
        Specified by:
        monthlyProcess in class BankAccount

      • deposit

        public void deposit(double amount)
        calls deposit method of super class, sets account to active if balance is equal to or greater than $100
        Overrides:
        deposit in class BankAccount
        Parameters:
        amount - total amount to be deposited

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(double amount)
        calls withdraw method of super class, sets account to inactive if balance is less than $100
        Overrides:
        withdraw in class BankAccount
        Parameters:
        amount - total amount to be withdrawn
        Returns:
        true if money withdrawn, false if account is less than $100

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        calls toString method of super class
        Overrides:
        toString in class BankAccount
        Returns:
        string representation of saving account
